page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
In our area we are short of entertainment. Our town is quite near other larger towns where entertainment is available. People can easily travel to {Doncaster, Leeds, Sheffield,}and { {Wakefield}for the {cinema}or{theatre. { The entertainment for adults is found mainly in{clubs}and{pubs.}Young people and teenagers go to{Wakefield }and{ {Doncaster}for{dancing}and{discos.} Young people like me (aged 11 yrs.) can find very little entertainment, all we have is a swimming pool.
For older people there is a{Bingo {Hall}together with{dancing groups}and{ {Derby and Joan clubs.}Many old people live in{'sheltered homes'}where entertainment is provided for them by the Warden and staff.
